about_the_game:
8 Bit Stories - Pixel Art Pack 2 is an official map chip material collection of tileset and character materials for RPG MAKER.
It consists of 4 themed pixel art worlds in the style of an 8 Bit game with a 4 color palette.

This pack contains various unique map sprites such as:
Unique furniture, treasure chest, and fencing for each theme along with, monster statues,
skeletal corpse, grandfather clock, bookcases, church pews, Christmas decorations, toys,
decorative water fountains, evergreen trees, computers and technology, switches and levers,
solar panels, teleporters, blacksmith furnace, blacksmith wall equipment and crafted works,
anvil, mine carts, tracks, and more!

A 16 pixel version of large custom buildings and dungeons from file 2 or file C are also included!

Aside from your main character for each theme, the pack contains animated character sprites such as
a Jack-o'-lantern, melting ice fence, electric fence, large animated dragon, exploding rock, and more!

Files were designed for RPG MAKER, so they're easy to use or edit right away to craft your games!
Contains 16, 32, and 48 pixel sized files for more customization for your game.
All pixel art files in this pack consist of the following RPG MAKER file format:

4 character sheets
4 large character sheets
4 A1 autotile sheets
4 A2
4 A3
4 A4
4 small content files- B
4 large content files- C

Additionally, there is a demo project available that features a variety of sample maps. Feel free to explore it for some creative inspiration.

・This pack is for use in Maker Series ONLY.
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker.
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
detailed_description:
8 Bit Stories - Pixel Art Pack 2 is an official map chip material collection of tileset and character materials for RPG MAKER.
It consists of 4 themed pixel art worlds in the style of an 8 Bit game with a 4 color palette.

This pack contains various unique map sprites such as:
Unique furniture, treasure chest, and fencing for each theme along with, monster statues,
skeletal corpse, grandfather clock, bookcases, church pews, Christmas decorations, toys,
decorative water fountains, evergreen trees, computers and technology, switches and levers,
solar panels, teleporters, blacksmith furnace, blacksmith wall equipment and crafted works,
anvil, mine carts, tracks, and more!

A 16 pixel version of large custom buildings and dungeons from file 2 or file C are also included!

Aside from your main character for each theme, the pack contains animated character sprites such as
a Jack-o'-lantern, melting ice fence, electric fence, large animated dragon, exploding rock, and more!

Files were designed for RPG MAKER, so they're easy to use or edit right away to craft your games!
Contains 16, 32, and 48 pixel sized files for more customization for your game.
All pixel art files in this pack consist of the following RPG MAKER file format:

4 character sheets
4 large character sheets
4 A1 autotile sheets
4 A2
4 A3
4 A4
4 small content files- B
4 large content files- C

Additionally, there is a demo project available that features a variety of sample maps. Feel free to explore it for some creative inspiration.

・This pack is for use in Maker Series ONLY.
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker.
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
